dmca.title: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Notice of Copyright Infringement by http://silentflowers.abused.ca/ (67
dmca.body:
nc 

-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Friday, June 17, 2005 1:13 PM
To: raven@ravensrants.com
Cc: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Notice of Copyright Infringement by
http://silentflowers.abused.ca/ (67.18.233.238)]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Your email is being forwarded on to our Copyright counsel for review, at the
address of copyright@theplanet.com.


- -------- Original Message --------
Subject: [ABUSE] Notice of Copyright Infringement by
http://silentflowers.abused.ca/ (67.18.233.238)
Date: Fri, 17 Jun 2005 11:19:13 -0500
From: Raven <raven@ravensrants.com>
To: abuse@theplanet.com

Dear Sir or Madam,

An individual using your service at the site http://silentflowers.abused.ca/
has been taking copyrighted works from my site and posting them on his both
without permission and stealing credit.

The works in question, Home is Not My Own and Dark Mirror, can be found on
my site, http://www.ravensrants.com at the following links:

http://www.ravensrants.com/poetry/000350.html and
http://www.ravensrants.com/poetry/000341.html

Also, prior to those links, which resulted from an upgrade for my site, you
could find them at these links:

http://www.ravensrants.com/poetry/homeown.shtml and
http://www.ravensrants.com/poetry/dmirror.shtml.

The infringing works appear on his site at the following links:

http://silentflowers.abused.ca/home.html and
http://silentflowers.abused.ca/leave_me_be.html (Retitled: Leave me Be).

These are original works produced by myself and I have all necessary
documentation including original drafts.

I realize that you are not at fault for this theft, but since my attempts to
contact the individual at fault has failed and your terms of service forbids
the posting of copyrighted works, I am writing you to request that these
pieces be taken down.

If you have any questions about this matter, feel free to write me at
raven@ravensrants.com and I will happily answer your queries. In the
meantime, I thank you very much for your help on this matter and I hope to
hear from you soon regarding it.

Thank you again.

Sincerely,

Jonathan "Raven" Bailey

http://www.ravensrants.com

- -------------------------------

DMCA Compliance:

I do affirm that in good faith, I believe that this material is not
authorized for this use. I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the
information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright
owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right
that is allegedly infringed.

Signed: Jonathan Bailey


- --
Thanks,
Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/aup/
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.2.5 (MingW32)
Comment: Using GnuPG with Thunderbird - http://enigmail.mozdev.org

iD8DBQFCsxKyvK/XpJs6oyURAgufAJ98Ujn/s8/zkpB3rL19VZjx7s+VDQCeIwQ/
dFZpfhvTra22pu7kubb2T/U=
=MEmg
-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----
